extendedInfo.description: Magzter - The Global Mobile Magazine Newsstand is an innovative product of the digital era which offers an interactive new age touch to magazines without losing the lustrous reading experience that most magazine lovers cherish.Magzter caters to a global audience with a wide range of magazines, from entertainment to news. On Magzter, readers can browse through magazines, choose articles and read them like they would do in real life! Some of the popular titles include Harper's Bazaar, Hong Kong Tatler, Cosmopolitan India, India Today, Outlook, FilmFare, Femina, Men's Health, Good Housekeeping etc.Readers can buy any single issue of the magazine or can opt-in for subscription model and also add favourite magazines to a customized shelf for quick access to magazines.Readers can flip through the pages and preview magazines before buying/subscribing to them. No hassle of creating new user account, just login with your Facebook account and start downloading the magazines.Download the app today and enjoy these features:** 100s of Paid and Free Magazines will be added and you can choose your favorite magazine and spend your time reading it.** Save up to 90% when you do buy annual subscriptions, single issues or back issues of your favourite magazines.** Read whether you are online or offline â on the go!We will be adding more free and paid magazines to the store. So please keep checking Magzter for your favourite magazines. If your favourite magazine is not available on Magzter, kindly drop us an email to contact@magzter.com

reviews.title: Lousy application
reviews.comment: Not worth and I need to download the same issue n number of times with no success in my Android device
reviews.author: Sivaraman S

reviews.title: Should be zero stars...buggy
reviews.comment: Terrible app on android. Just bought a subscription but what a mistake. Starting loading but crashed on 2nd page.
reviews.author: keene Keen

reviews.comment: Awesome way to carry reading and staying light while travelling
reviews.author: Chirag Kenia

reviews.title: Far too many issues
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe this is so slow compared to the iOS version, the download takes ages. The double tap to zoom is not good enough. The overall ui experience is not as good as iPad. Payment should be through Google\'s play store, its much more secure than using card.   Disappointed, I prefer reading it on my iPad than on nexus.
reviews.author: Johnson E

reviews.title: Poor Android app and support!
reviews.comment: A magazine purchased in Jan 2012 only downloads first 22 pages on my Nexus 4. Support advised reinstalling after deleting the SD card folders as well. No difference after re-installing several times. No SD card on my phone! I am able to view the full 400 page mag on my laptop and on my ipad magzter app. Support won\'t respond to any further emails after the initial response!Lucky that I didn\'t make any subscription purchases which I would have regretted.! No way to cancel auto-renewals either!
reviews.author: Rakesh Monga

reviews.title: Pathetic experience
reviews.comment: The app is way too laggy.  I am just unable to read any subscription on it as it stutters at almost every point.  Using htc one.
reviews.author: Safi uzzaman

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It\'s great app for reading mags.
reviews.author: Xibalba Slovakia

reviews.title: Buggy and freezes
reviews.comment: Sadly I realized that this buggy software on android just freezes and stops responding ....after I had subscribed to annual subscription of a popular magazine .....money down the drain.
reviews.author: Gaurav jeet

reviews.title: take lots  of space yet good
reviews.comment: nyc app bt tking lots of space. i gv 4 star dis app.
reviews.author: deepak kumar

reviews.title: Good but takes lot of space
reviews.comment: No option for storing your subscription magazines on ext sd card and this takes a lot of valuable internal storage. A single issue of India today is around 350 Mb so plz. Include this option in ur updates and I will revise my rating.
reviews.author: Anubandh Srivastav

reviews.comment: Wish I can see details in my profile as how long I have subscribed for a particularly magazine.  It\'s even weird to see how pricing of the magazines are done,
reviews.author: rajiv salgotra

reviews.title: not enough space
reviews.comment: i will give 5 stars if the app is able specify the location to store the magazines. some phone and tablets have miserable internal storage. it is troublesome having to delete before downloading new one.
reviews.author: Kevin Lim

reviews.title: Needs an overhaul
reviews.comment: This app should make it easy/cheaper to buy e magazines. Why pay more for an online version and not be able to download it fast? Being able to read these magazines in other readers,would help
reviews.author: Tarun Thomas Abraham

reviews.title: Not so ez to use
reviews.comment: Can\'t find the offline mode. Can\'t be downloading everytime I open the magazine. data charges!!! Plus they\'re doesn\'t seem to be a skip to... page number function? Or I just can\'t find it?
reviews.author: Annabel Koh

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Purchase Books Are in Top Free .
reviews.author: Jeremy tan

reviews.title: Simple and friendly
reviews.comment: Simple user experience. Friendly cust care support. Awesome magazine prices! Some are 50% off physical copy and so much lighter to carry around! Best of all, I can read on my phone and tablet!
reviews.author: Angie ong
